title: Client keeps crashing when i try and open loot
body: Over the last couple of days my client keeps crashing when and only when i try ans access loot. According to task manager it is still open but i cant access it. I saw the same thing happen on a stream last night. Rito?

replies.body:
Do you happen to be running Plays.tv? If so, try updating it or uninstalling it to see if anything changes. 

Otherwise, ensure you have all the latest windows updates installed, which has sometimes resolved this issue.

Let me know if anything changed.
Didn't change anything but there is  no longer an issue
